zone.line: Within whose veins long ran
The Vipers palsying venom, lifts her heeeel
To bruise his heead. The signal - & the seal,
If Hope & Truth & Justice can avail
Art thou of all these hopes. All hail!
Florence, beneath the Sun
Of cities fairest onee,
Blushes within her bower for Freedom's expectation;
From eyes of quenchless hope
Rome tears thee priestly cope,
As ruling once by power, so now by admiration;
An Athlete stript
Eager again to run
remoter
From a sublimer station
For the high prize lost on Philippi's shore:
As then Hope Truth & Justice did avail
So now may Fraud & Wrong. All Hail
Hear ye the march as of the Earth born Forms
Arrayed against the ever-living Gods? —
The crash & darkness of a thousand storms
Bursting thier inaccessible abodes
Of crags & thunder clouds?
See ye the banners blazoned to the day
